Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 2nd overall pick, by Texas in 1981...
Had first career hit (triple) on 4/1/1983, off Fernando Arroyo (OAK)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/4/1983, off Mike Boddicker (OAK)...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/7/1983, hitting .462 with 2 HR, 3 RBI...
Injured on 4/12/1983 with a Sore Back, out for one week...
Was selected to the 1983 Allstar game...
Hit 3 homeruns against Boston, driving in 7 runs on 9/6/1983...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/8/1983, hitting .448 with 6 HR, 12 RBI...
Won Rookie of the Year Award in 1983, hitting .305 with 21 HR, 85 RBI...
Was selected to the 1984 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/21/1984, hitting .385 with 3 HR, 10 RBI...
Was selected to the 1986 Allstar game...
Won MVP Award in 1986, hitting .352 with 27 HR, 118 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/21/1987, hitting .440 with 3 HR, 12 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 8/1/1987, hitting .395 with 7 HR, 21 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/11/1987, hitting .400 with 4 HR, 10 RBI...
Had 23-game hitting streak snapped on 8/14/1987...
Was selected to the 1988 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against Oakland on 9/16/1988...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/16/1989, hitting .500 with 3 HR, 7 RBI...
Was selected to the 1989 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/8/1989, hitting .538 with 2 HR, 7 RBI...
Won World Series with Texas in 1989...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against New York (A) on 6/21/1990...
Was selected to the 1990 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/11/1990, hitting .593 with 2 HR, 9 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Chicago (A) on 9/15/1990...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/22/1990, hitting .560 with 5 HR, 6 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 10/1/1990, hitting .361 with 10 HR, 25 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/14/1991, hitting .500 with 3 HR, 5 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 5/1/1991, hitting .355 with 8 HR, 30 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/16/1991, hitting .481 with 2 HR, 7 RBI...
Was selected to the 1991 Allstar game...
Signed as a free agent by California on 2/3/1992 to a 3-year deal worth $20,000,002 per year...
Injured on 6/25/1992 with a Dislocated Finger, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had 2000th career hit on 4/26/1993, off Dave Stewart (CLE)...
Was selected to the 1994 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/29/1994, hitting .500 with 3 HR, 11 RBI...
